translations.translation: So will you not use your intellect?
Or at night. Then how is it you do not understand?
and at night. Do you still not understand?
And during the night; so do you not have sense?
And at night; will you not then reflect
And at night; do you not then understand?
and in the night; will you not understand?
And at night-time; have ye then no sense?
and night: will you not take heed?
And at night. Will ye not therefore reflect?
and at night. Do you not exercise your reason?
And by night: will ye not understand?
And at night; will you not then reflect?
and at night, will you not understand?
And at night. Do you not understand?
And at night. Then will you not use reason?
[37:138] and at night: will you, O people of Mecca, not then understand?, what befell them and so take heed therefrom?
And at night time; have ye then no sense) do you not believe in what was done to them, such that you do not follow their example?

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: وبالجملة: هي على طريقكم أيها المجبولون على العبرة والعظة { أَفَلاَ تَعْقِلُونَ } [الصافات: 138] وتتفكرون فيما جرى عليهم بشؤم تكذيبهم وإنكارهم على رسل الله؛ ليعتبروا منهم ومن أطلالهم ورسومهم المندرسة المنكوسة، ولا تفعلوا مثل أفعالهم
